title: A map or groundplott of the citty of London with the suburbes thereof so farr as the Lord Mayors iurisdication doeth extend by which is exactly demonstrated the present condition of it since the last sad accident of fire. The blanke space signifyng [sic] the burnt part & where the houses be those places yet standing. A‚Å∞ 1666.
publisher: Sould by Nathanael Brooke, in Gresham Colledge in the second yard as you go into the Exchange from Bishopsgate Street,
notes: Reproduction of the original at the Trinity College Library, Cambridge.
